title: Candy
lyrics: Tone  Honey ajikdo gomin hae? Geurae neon josimseureop ge Sugar, spice garyeoboneun de (ah) Omyohan i tensyeon Nado silchi ana Something, something original Nal seontaekagil jamsi gidaryeotji yeah, yeah Teukbyeolhan naega doel ge Soni ga soni gage yeah Naege jungdokdoel ten de (yeah) Girl I'm your candy (candy, candy) Giga makin chemistry (candy, candy) Eoreunseureoun sinamon Jom utgineun minteu mwol deo won hae Pop rocks, strawberry, bubble gum Jumeoni sok hyanggi neomchimyeon All I want is you my love (yep), candy Neon gibun joajil tende Honja inneun kamkamhan sangja sok Jogeumssik nan geumi gabeori ji Geureon saenggakdeul toesaekdoeneun flavor I say tumyeonghago dansunhago sipeo (make it simple) Neoege man nareul matchwogago sipeo (gago sipeo, oh yeah) I'll give you something original Neon bokjapan saramin geol anikka Mwoga neol utge hani Geuge nayeosseumyeon hae Uulhaehaji ma babe One wish nega yeoreojwo Girl I'm your candy (candy, candy) Giga makin chemistry (candy, candy) Eoreunseureoun sinamon Jom utgineun minteu mwol deo won hae Pop rocks, strawberry, bubble gum Jumeoni sok hyanggi neomchimyeon All I want is you my love (yep), candy Neon gibun joajil tende Badajullae invita tion Ne soneun dagawa is seo Saljjak nogeul jeongdoman Girl I'm your candy Jomajomahan sigan Don't you let me down Nan neo anin dareun seontaegiran eopja na  Girl I'm your candy (candy, candy) Giga makin chemistry (candy, candy) Eoreunseureoun sinamon Jom utgineun minteu mwol deo won hae Pop rocks, strawberry, bubble gum Jumeoni sok hyanggi neomchimyeon All I want is you my love (yep), candy Neon gibun joajil tende
